// House
// URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/ALG07/

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		string con;
		cin >> con;
		
		int hno;
		scanf("%d",&hno);
		int sz = con.size();
		int cond[sz];
		for(int i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
			cond[i] = con[i] - '0';
		int x[sz];
		x[0] = 1;
		if(sz > 1)
		{
			x[1] = cond[0] - x[0];
			for(int i = 2; i < sz; ++i)
				x[i] = cond[i - 1] - x[i - 1] - x[i - 2];
		}
		bool flag = true;
		for(int i = 0; i < sz; ++i)
			if(x[i] < 0 || x[i] > 1)flag = false;
		//if(cond[sz - 1] != x[sz - 2] + x[sz - 1])
		//	flag = false;
		if(flag)
		{
			cout << x[hno] << endl;
		}
		else
			cout << "NONE\n";
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
